TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityWithKey

summary.span: 定義公開 (Expose) 實體 (Entity) 索引鍵的實體類型。

span.span: Defines an entity type that exposes an entity key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個介面是用來將實體索引鍵公開給物件服務。This interface is used to expose the entity key to Object Services. 物件服務會使用 屬性，在物件內容中管理物件。Object Services uses the property to manage objects in the object context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)和[POCO 實體中的 追蹤變更](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Data::EntityKey ^ EntityKey { System::Data::EntityKey ^ get(); void set(System::Data::EntityKey ^ value); };

summary.span: 針對實作這個介面之實體類型的執行個體取得或設定 。

span.span: Gets or sets the for instances of entity types that implement this interface.

value.span: 實體型別的執行個體的 ，其會實作這個介面。

span.span: The for instances of entity types that implement this interface.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件服務會使用 屬性，在物件內容中管理物件。Object Services uses the property to manage objects in the object context. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[識別解析、 狀態管理和變更追蹤](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0)和[POCO 實體中的 追蹤變更](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461)。For more information, see [Identity Resolution, State Management, and Change Tracking](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3bd49311-0e72-4ea4-8355-38fe57036ba0) and [Tracking Changes in POCO Entities](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/52d2fc77-5c87-4082-a8e2-a2952ceb8461).
